definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: wax, [[דּוֹנַג]] Mic 1:4 + 2 t.; [[דּוֹנׇג֑]] Ps 22:15—always in simile, of melting; at theophany hills melt like wax Ps 97:5; like wax before fire Mic 1:4; wicked perish as wax melteth before fire Ps 68:3; heart melteth like wax Ps 22:15 (simile of fear, despair). On ´[[ד]] in Ps 118:12 cf. Bae Che:crit. n.
